text: @realDonaldTrump Except it was all a democrat initiative which republicans were too scared to support until they got their orders from you. Thank you, Madam Speaker @SpeakerPelosi for your leadership at this time of crisis and for protecting the American people. #TrumpIsUnfit #coronavirus
